rentals.name: The UFO Bungalow
rentals.description: Experience an out-of-this-world stay in our UFO-themed bungalow. Enjoy cosmic views and "alien" hospitality—this stay is truly out of this world!

rentals.name: Haunted Loft
rentals.description: Live with friendly ghosts in our elegantly eerie loft. Paranormal activity is included at no extra charge!

rentals.name: The Meme Mansion
rentals.description: Step into a house where every wall is plastered with iconic memes. Picture "Side Eyeing Chloe" smirking in the living room, and "Chill Guy" artwork exuding laid-back vibes in the hallway.

rentals.name: The Upside-Down Hacienda
rentals.description: Challenge gravity in a house flipped on its roof—furniture, decor, and even your morning coffee cup are all upside down. Prepare for a topsy-turvy stay!

rentals.name: The Marshmallow Mansion
rentals.description: Float in fluffy luxury within walls of giant, pillowy marshmallows. Complimentary hot chocolate served 24/7 to keep the sugar rush going!

rentals.name: The Unicorn Lava Lounge
rentals.description: Bask in the warm glow of rainbow lava as unicorns trot by with your midnight snack. Glitter geysers activate on the hour—towels not included!

rentals.name: The Procrastination Palace
rentals.description: A retreat where all clocks show different times, deadlines don't exist, and tomorrow never comes. Features a 'Just 5 More Minutes' bedroom and a 'I'll Do It Later' lounge.

rentals.name: The Ramen Residence
rentals.description: Live the college dream in luxury! Swimming pool filled with noodles, instant ramen dispenser in every room, and a midnight snack vending machine that only accepts spare change.
